abilities.text: Once during your turn, if this Pokémon is the last card in your hand, you may play it onto your Bench. If you do, draw 3 cards.

attacks.name: Head Crack

attacks.name: U-turn

attacks.text: You may switch this Pokémon with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Energy Press
attacks.text: This attack does 30 damage for each Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Amazing Bloom
attacks.text: For each of your Benched Pokémon, search your deck for a card that evolves from that Pokémon and put it onto that Pokémon to evolve it. Then, shuffle your deck.

abilities.name: Shifty Substitution
abilities.text: As long as this Pokémon is in the Active Spot, each Supporter card in your opponent's hand has the effect “Draw 3 cards.” (This happens instead of the card's usual effect.)

name: Allister
rules: Draw 3 cards. If you drew any cards in this way, discard up to 3 cards from your hand. (You must discard at least 1 card.)
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Bea
rules: Discard the top 5 cards of your deck, and attach any Energy cards you discarded in this way to your Benched Fighting Pokémon in any way you like.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Beauty
rules: If you go first, you may play this card during your first turn.Draw 2 cards.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Cara Liss
rules: Search your deck for up to 2 Rare Fossil cards and put them onto your Bench. Then, shuffle your deck.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Circhester Bath
rules: All Basic Pokémon (both yours and your opponent's) take 20 less damage from attacks from the opponent's Pokémon (after applying Weakness and Resistance).
You may play only 1 Stadium card during your turn. Put it next to the Active Spot, and discard it if another Stadium comes into play. A Stadium with the same name can't be played.

name: Drone Rotom
rules: Your opponent reveals their hand. If they do, look at the top card of your opponent's deck.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Hero's Medal
rules: The Pokémon VMAX this card is attached to gets -100 HP, and if it is Knocked Out by damage from an attack from your opponent's Pokémon, that player takes 1 fewer Prize card. You can't attach this card to a Pokémon VMAX that has 100 HP or less remaining.

name: League Staff
rules: Draw 2 cards. If Wyndon Stadium is in play, draw 2 more cards.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Leon
rules: During this turn, your Pokémon's attacks do 30 more damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Memory Capsule
rules: The Pokémon this card is attached to can use any attack from its previous Evolutions. (You still need the necessary Energy to use each attack.)

name: Moomoo Cheese
rules: Heal 30 damage from up to 2 of your Pokémon that have Energy attached.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Nessa
rules: Put up to 4 in any combination of Water Pokémon and Water Energy cards from your discard pile into your hand.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Opal
rules: Flip 2 coins. Search your deck for a number of cards up to the number of heads, put them into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Rocky Helmet
rules: If the Pokémon this card is attached to is your Active Pokémon and is damaged by an opponent's attack (even if that Pokémon is Knocked Out), put 2 damage counters on the Attacking Pokémon.

name: Telescopic Sight
rules: The attacks of the Pokémon this card is attached to do 30 more damage to your opponent's Benched Pokémon V and Benched Pokémon-GX.

name: Wyndon Stadium
rules: Whenever either player plays a Pokémon VMAX from their hand to evolve a Pokémon V during their turn, heal 100 damage from that Pokémon.
You may play only 1 Stadium card during your turn. Put it next to the Active Spot, and discard it if another Stadium comes into play. A Stadium with the same name can't be played.

name: Aromatic Grass Energy
rules: As long as this card is attached to a Pokémon, it provides Grass Energy.The Grass Pokémon this card is attached to recovers from all Special Conditions and can't be affected by any Special Conditions.

name: Coating Metal Energy
rules: As long as this card is attached to a Pokémon, it provides Metal Energy.The Metal Pokémon this card is attached to has no Weakness.

name: Stone Fighting Energy
rules: As long as this card is attached to a Pokémon, it provides Fighting Energy.The Fighting Pokémon this card is attached to takes 20 less damage from attacks from your opponent's Pokémon (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

name: Wash Water Energy
rules: As long as this card is attached to a Pokémon, it provides Water Energy.Prevent all effects of attacks from your opponent's Pokémon done to the Water Pokémon this card is attached to. (Existing effects are not removed. Damage is not an effect.)

rules: Discard the top 5 cards of your deck, and attach any Energy cards you discarded in this way to your Benched Fighting Pokémon in any way you like.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Beauty
rules: If you go first, you may play this card during your first turn.Draw 2 cards.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Leon
rules: During this turn, your Pokémon's attacks do 30 more damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Nessa
rules: Put up to 4 in any combination of Water Pokémon and Water Energy cards from your discard pile into your hand.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Opal
rules: Flip 2 coins. Search your deck for a number of cards up to the number of heads, put them into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Pokémon Center Lady
rules: Heal 60 damage and remove all Special Conditions from 1 of your Pokémon.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

abilities.name: Eerie Beam
abilities.text: Once during your turn, if this Pokémon is in the Active Spot, you may put 1 damage counter on each of your opponent's Pokémon.

attacks.name: G-Max Wave
attacks.text: This attack does 50 more damage for each Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Max Whiteout
attacks.text: This attack also does 30 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: G-Max Volt Tackle
attacks.text: You may discard all Energy from this Pokémon. If you do, this attack does 150 more damage.

attacks.name: Eruption Shot
attacks.text: Discard the top card of your deck. If that card is an Energy card, this attack does 90 more damage, and attach that card to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Max Hack
attacks.text: This attack does 30 more damage for each Prize card you have taken.

attacks.name: Max Glide
attacks.text: You may search your deck for up to 2 cards and put them into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

name: Allister
rules: Draw 3 cards. If you drew any cards in this way, discard up to 3 cards from your hand. (You must discard at least 1 card.)
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Bea
rules: Discard the top 5 cards of your deck, and attach any Energy cards you discarded in this way to your Benched Fighting Pokémon in any way you like.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

rules: If you go first, you may play this card during your first turn.Draw 2 cards.

name: Nessa
rules: Put up to 4 in any combination of Water Pokémon and Water Energy cards from your discard pile into your hand.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Opal

You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

abilities.name: Untamed Shout
abilities.text: When you play this Pokémon from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokémon during your turn, you may put 3 damage counters on 1 of your opponent's Pokémon.

attacks.name: Obstruct
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, prevent all damage done to this Pokémon by attacks from Basic Pokémon.

abilities.name: Primate Wisdom
abilities.text: Once during your turn, you may switch a card from your hand with the top card of your deck.

name: Cape of Toughness
rules: The Basic Pokémon this card is attached to gets +50 HP, except Pokémon-GX.

name: Hero's Medal
rules: The Pokémon VMAX this card is attached to gets -100 HP, and if it is Knocked Out by damage from an attack from your opponent's Pokémon, that player takes 1 fewer Prize card. You can't attach this card to a Pokémon VMAX that has 100 HP or less remaining.

name: Memory Capsule
rules: The Pokémon this card is attached to can use any attack from its previous Evolutions. (You still need the necessary Energy to use each attack.)

name: Telescopic Sight
rules: The attacks of the Pokémon this card is attached to do 30 more damage to your opponent's Benched Pokémon V and Benched Pokémon-GX.
